channel.title: KaoTic Gaming || KaoTic Refugee || Mw2 || Mw3 || Quickscope
channel.description:
Team KaoTic is a Newly started clan, making it's way to the top. We have a ranking system we go by. We will be giving tryouts Whenever we can and we would really appreciate it if you use this post for clan purposes and nothing worthless, we made this post for one reason and it was to promote the clan.
KaoTic has Many players, as well as branches.
MW2 Quickscoping - Legacy - Leader : KaoTic Refugee and KaoTic Amazed MW2 Trickshotting - Exodus - Leader : KaoTic Refugee and KaoTic Amazed MW2 TryHard - Needed - Leader : Needed
MW3 Quickscoping - Needed - Leader : Needed MW3 Trickshotting - Needed - Leader : Needed MW3 Tryhard - Glory - Leader : KaoTic Tryhard
We Will be starting More Branches as the Clan increases, Right now the Executive Branch of the Team(The Branch with the Higher Ranked Team Members) is Legacy. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
We Have Many Members in KaoTic, Here are our Rosters: Founders: KaoTic Refugee KaoTic TryHard ----------------- Leaders: KaoTic Refugee(Legacy) KaoTic TryHard(Glory) KaoTic Amazed(Legacy) KaoTic ExorCist(Legacy) ----------------- Officers: KaoTic AlphA(Legacy) DubStepREloadED(Legacy) MumZzIrGrizzz(Legacy) ----------------- Members: KaoTic Skrillex(Legacy) KaoTic Temperrr(Legacy) KaoTic DemOn(Legacy) KaoTic VenOm(Legacy) KaoTic Rev(Legacy) BlackIce3142(Glory) SuckOnThat420(Glory) FrazierKid01(Glory) -----------------
KaoTic Is Recruiting. We Would Like you to put a post here following the format below, and please message "KaoTic Refugee" On Xbox after posting. The Tryout will be a 1v1 With a KaoTic Member Verse you, or a 2v2 with two KaoTic Members Verse You and a Friend/Someone else wanting to join. If we have a few people whom want to join, we will put youa ll against eachother in a Free For All. The top three Scorers will be pit up against a KaoTic Member. ----------------- Format: Name(If You don't mind): GamerTag: Time Zone: Branch Applying for(Branches above): Headset(Yes/No): Recent Clans(eg; OpTic, FaZe, xGeN, ect.): Age: Slight of Hand or Marathon(What you use): Bio(tell us a bit about yourself): ----------------- Thanks for Reading this, KaoTic is Recruiting 24/7!

item.title: KaoTic Gaming || KaoTic Refugee || Mw2 || Mw3 || Quickscope
item.dc:creator: @Cali_Tree Cali Tree
item.description:
@Cali_Tree wrote:

Team KaoTic is a Newly started clan, making it’s way to the top. We have a ranking system we go by. We will be giving tryouts Whenever we can and we would really appreciate it if you use this post for clan purposes and nothing worthless, we made this post for one reason and it was to promote the clan.

KaoTic has Many players, as well as branches.

MW2 Quickscoping - Legacy - Leader : KaoTic Refugee and KaoTic Amazed
MW2 Trickshotting - Exodus - Leader : KaoTic Refugee and KaoTic Amazed
MW2 TryHard - Needed - Leader : Needed

MW3 Quickscoping - Needed - Leader : Needed
MW3 Trickshotting - Needed - Leader : Needed
MW3 Tryhard - Glory - Leader : KaoTic Tryhard

We Will be starting More Branches as the Clan increases, Right now the Executive Branch of the Team(The Branch with the Higher Ranked Team Members) is Legacy.

We Have Many Members in KaoTic, Here are our Rosters:
Founders:
KaoTic Refugee
KaoTic TryHard

Leaders:
KaoTic Refugee(Legacy)
KaoTic TryHard(Glory)
KaoTic Amazed(Legacy)
KaoTic ExorCist(Legacy)

Officers:
KaoTic AlphA(Legacy)
DubStepREloadED(Legacy)
MumZzIrGrizzz(Legacy)

Members:
KaoTic Skrillex(Legacy)
KaoTic Temperrr(Legacy)
KaoTic DemOn(Legacy)
KaoTic VenOm(Legacy)
KaoTic Rev(Legacy)
BlackIce3142(Glory)
SuckOnThat420(Glory)
FrazierKid01(Glory)

KaoTic Is Recruiting. We Would Like you to put a post here following the format below, and please message “KaoTic Refugee” On Xbox after posting. The Tryout will be a 1v1 With a KaoTic Member Verse you, or a 2v2 with two KaoTic Members Verse You and a Friend/Someone else wanting to join.
If we have a few people whom want to join, we will put youa ll against eachother in a Free For All. The top three Scorers will be pit up against a KaoTic Member.

Format:
Name(If You don’t mind):
GamerTag:
Time Zone:
Branch Applying for(Branches above):
Headset(Yes/No):
Recent Clans(eg; OpTic, FaZe, xGeN, ect.):
Age:
Slight of Hand or Marathon(What you use):
Bio(tell us a bit about yourself):

Thanks for Reading this, KaoTic is Recruiting 24/7!
